item.title: Windows11 关闭自动更新教程
item.author: KZaqur@outlook.com (Auseper)
item.description:
<h2 id="前言" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#%e5%89%8d%e8%a8%80" class="heading-mark"></a><span>前言</span>
 <a href="#%e5%89%8d%e8%a8%80" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>因为有些软件及插件，因 Windows11 的更新导致无法使用，故编写此教程。</p>
<h3 id="打开注册表" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#%e6%89%93%e5%bc%80%e6%b3%a8%e5%86%8c%e8%a1%a8" class="heading-mark"></a><span>打开注册表</span>
 <a href="#%e6%89%93%e5%bc%80%e6%b3%a8%e5%86%8c%e8%a1%a8" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>Win+R，输入 regedit，到 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\WindowsUpdate\UX\Settings 目录下，如图所示</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/1.png" alt="1" srcset="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/1.png?size=small, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/1.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/1.png?size=large 2x" data-title="1" style="--width: 951px;--aspect-ratio: 951 / 724;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>右键新建一个 DWORD 类型的值，名为 <code>FlightSettingsMaxPauseDays</code>，如图所示</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/2.png" alt="2" srcset="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/2.png?size=small, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/2.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/2.png?size=large 2x" data-title="2" style="--width: 1038px;--aspect-ratio: 1038 / 679;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>右键修改，选择10进制，数据改为 2048，如图所示</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/3.png" alt="3" srcset="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/3.png?size=small, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/3.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/3.png?size=large 2x" data-title="3" style="--width: 385px;--aspect-ratio: 385 / 251;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>最后我们在设置，Windows 更新中选择暂停更新时长，如图拉到底选择最长，这样就关闭了 Windows11 自动更新。</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/4.png" alt="4" srcset="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/4.png?size=small, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/4.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/8e24c3c/images/4.png?size=large 2x" data-title="4" style="--width: 882px;--aspect-ratio: 882 / 923;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>

item.title: MFC 静态文本设置超链接
item.author: KZaqur@outlook.com (Auseper)
item.description:
<h2 id="mfc-静态文本设置超链接" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#mfc-%e9%9d%99%e6%80%81%e6%96%87%e6%9c%ac%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%ae%e8%b6%85%e9%93%be%e6%8e%a5" class="heading-mark"></a><span>MFC 静态文本设置超链接</span>
 <a href="#mfc-%e9%9d%99%e6%80%81%e6%96%87%e6%9c%ac%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%ae%e8%b6%85%e9%93%be%e6%8e%a5" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="11-mfc-静态文本超链接介绍" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#11-mfc-%e9%9d%99%e6%80%81%e6%96%87%e6%9c%ac%e8%b6%85%e9%93%be%e6%8e%a5%e4%bb%8b%e7%bb%8d" class="heading-mark"></a><span>1.1 MFC 静态文本超链接介绍</span>
 <a href="#11-mfc-%e9%9d%99%e6%80%81%e6%96%87%e6%9c%ac%e8%b6%85%e9%93%be%e6%8e%a5%e4%bb%8b%e7%bb%8d" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>用 MFC 开发软件时，有时候需要设置一个超链接并用其他颜色显示出来，且鼠标点击后跳转到指定的网页。
这时候可以设置一个静态文本，弄一个超链接。</p>
<h3 id="12-添加成员变量及初始化代码" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#12-%e6%b7%bb%e5%8a%a0%e6%88%90%e5%91%98%e5%8f%98%e9%87%8f%e5%8f%8a%e5%88%9d%e5%a7%8b%e5%8c%96%e4%bb%a3%e7%a0%81" class="heading-mark"></a><span>1.2 添加成员变量及初始化代码</span>
 <a href="#12-%e6%b7%bb%e5%8a%a0%e6%88%90%e5%91%98%e5%8f%98%e9%87%8f%e5%8f%8a%e5%88%9d%e5%a7%8b%e5%8c%96%e4%bb%a3%e7%a0%81" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>在头文件中添加成员变量 <code>CRect m_rect;</code>
在初始化函数 OnInitDialog() 中添加</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-cpp" data-lang="cpp"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">GetDlgItem</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">IDC_STATIC_AUTHOR</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">-&gt;</span><span class="n">GetWindowRect</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">m_rect</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">ScreenToClient</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="n">m_rect</span><span class="p">);</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="alert alert-note"><p class="alert-title"><svg class="icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16"><path d="M0 8a8 8 0 1116 0A8 8 0 010 8zm8-6.5a6.5 6.5.0 100 13 6.5 6.5.0 000-13zM6.5 7.75A.75.75.0 017.25 7h1a.75.75.0 01.75.75v2.75h.25a.75.75.0 010 1.5h-2a.75.75.0 010-1.5h.25v-2h-.25a.75.75.0 01-.75-.75zM8 6a1 1 0 110-2 1 1 0 010 2z"/></svg>Note</p><p>GetDlgItem(IDC_STATIC_AUTHOR) 里添加的是你的控件 ID。目的在于获取到 Static Text 的矩形区域。</p>
</div><h3 id="13-添加-wm_lbuttonup-事件" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#13-%e6%b7%bb%e5%8a%a0-wm_lbuttonup-%e4%ba%8b%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark"></a><span>1.3 添加 WM_LBUTTONUP 事件</span>
 <a href="#13-%e6%b7%bb%e5%8a%a0-wm_lbuttonup-%e4%ba%8b%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>右键控件-&gt;类向导-&gt;消息-&gt;添加 WM_LBUTTONUP 事件，OnLButtonUp() 函数实现如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-cpp" data-lang="cpp"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="n">CAntiHashDlg</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">OnLButtonUp</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">UINT</span> <span class="n">nFlags</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">CPoint</span> <span class="n">point</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">point</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="n">m_rect</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">left</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="n">point</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">m_rect</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">right</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="n">point</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">m_rect</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">bottom</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="n">point</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="n">m_rect</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">top</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// 网址中添加你需要打开的指定网页地址
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="n">ShellExecute</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">_T</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;网址&#34;</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">SW_SHOWNORMAL</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">CDialog</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">OnLButtonUp</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">nFlags</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">point</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="14-添加鼠标移动事件-wm_mousemove" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#14-%e6%b7%bb%e5%8a%a0%e9%bc%a0%e6%a0%87%e7%a7%bb%e5%8a%a8%e4%ba%8b%e4%bb%b6-wm_mousemove" class="heading-mark"></a><span>1.4 添加鼠标移动事件 WM_MOUSEMOVE</span>
 <a href="#14-%e6%b7%bb%e5%8a%a0%e9%bc%a0%e6%a0%87%e7%a7%bb%e5%8a%a8%e4%ba%8b%e4%bb%b6-wm_mousemove" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>添加方法如1.3，OnMouseMove() 函数实现如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-cpp" data-lang="cpp"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="n">CAntiHashDlg</span><span class="o">::</span><span class="n">OnMouseMove</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">UINT</span> <span class="n">nFlags</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">CPoint</span> <span class="n">point</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">point</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="n">m_rect</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">left</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="n">point</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">m_rect</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">right</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="n">point</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">m_rect</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">bottom</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="n">point</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="n">m_rect</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">top</span><span class="p">)</span>

item.title: 麻匪音频识别壁纸如何适配网易云
item.author: KZaqur@outlook.com (Auseper)
item.description:
<h3 id="01-准备工作" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#01-%e5%87%86%e5%a4%87%e5%b7%a5%e4%bd%9c" class="heading-mark"></a><span>01 准备工作</span>
 <a href="#01-%e5%87%86%e5%a4%87%e5%b7%a5%e4%bd%9c" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>大家用过麻匪大佬的音频识别壁纸吧，壁纸非常的不错，但是音频识别并不适配网易云，我们需要使用第三方网易云客户端来进行适配音频识别。但是我们选择用插件来进行适配网易云音频识别。
那么首先我们得要有一个网易云旧版客户端，注意不是最新 3.0 版本的客户端，虽然说也支持，但是有些插件不支持最新版本。所以我们选择旧版客户端，还有需要准备一个插件，叫 BetterNCM，直接搜索就可以搜索到，可以到 <a href="https://microblock.cc/betterncm"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">BetterNCM</a> 去下载。到这里，准备工作就此完毕。</p>
<h3 id="02-开始安装插件" class="heading-element">
 <a href="#02-%e5%bc%80%e5%a7%8b%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85%e6%8f%92%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark"></a><span>02 开始安装插件</span>
 <a href="#02-%e5%bc%80%e5%a7%8b%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85%e6%8f%92%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark-link">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>为了方便后期操作，你可以单独建一个文件夹来存放 betterncm 的安装包，注意，一定要退出网易云，确定没有进程运行后右键以管理员身份运行 betterncm 安装包。</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/1.png" alt="1" srcset="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/1.png?size=small, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/1.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/1.png?size=large 2x" data-title="1" style="--width: 764px;--aspect-ratio: 764 / 538;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>如上图所示，点击安装即可。安装好后关闭软件，打开网易云，在上方栏中找到插件，如下图所示</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/2.png" alt="2" srcset="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/2.png?size=small, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/2.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/2.png?size=large 2x" data-title="2" style="--width: 519px;--aspect-ratio: 519 / 390;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>在插件列表中找到 InfLink 安装即可，插件如下图所示</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/3.png" alt="3" srcset="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/3.png?size=small, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/3.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/3.png?size=large 2x" data-title="3" style="--width: 892px;--aspect-ratio: 892 / 557;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>顺便安装一下降级插件，找到 DowngradeOK 并安装，如下图所示</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/4.png" alt="4" srcset="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/4.png?size=small, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/4.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/4.png?size=large 2x" data-title="4" style="--width: 842px;--aspect-ratio: 842 / 552;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<p>至此，所有的适配工作已经完毕。放首音乐看看效果。</p>
<p><img loading="lazy" src="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/5.png" alt="5" srcset="https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/5.png?size=small, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/5.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://kzaqur.github.io/posts/1dff436/images/5.png?size=large 2x" data-title="5" style="--width: 1166px;--aspect-ratio: 1166 / 842;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
